text: José Ramón Gurruchaga Ezama (March 29, 1931 - April 11, 2017) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1961, Gurruchaga Ezama served as bishop of the Diocese of Huaraz, Peru, from 1987 to 1996. He then served as bishop of the Diocese of Lurin from 1996 to 2006.Diocese of Lurin ==Notes== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Peruvian Roman Catholic bishops
title: José Ramón Gurruchaga Ezama
